name: Validate master data snapshot report for nitrosamine
description: This test case test API to validate the master data snapshot report for nitrosamine with excel file data
descriptionHtml: This test case test API to validate the master data snapshot report for nitrosamine with excel file data
statusMessage:

self = <test_audit_portal_formulation_facility.TestAuditPortalLimits object at 0x00000125BAF8FAD0>

    @allure.title("Validate master data snapshot report for nitrosamine")
    @allure.description("This test case test API to validate the master data snapshot report for nitrosamine with "
                        "excel file data")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/85zt9r0x3")
    @pytest.mark.validate_master_data_snapshot_report_nitrosamine
    def test_validate_master_data_snapshot_report_nitrosamine(self):
        data = {}
        mismatched_rows = []
        assert_flag = False
    
        data.update({"sheet_name": "Nitrosamines"})
    
        master_data_snapshot = self.get_audit_portal.test_config_new_master_data_snapshot_report(data)["response"]
    
        if master_data_snapshot:
            master_data_snapshot = pd.json_normalize(master_data_snapshot)
    
            columns_mapping = {"externalId": "Nitrosamine Id", "acceptableIntake": "Acceptable Intake (ng)",
                               "ade": "Acceptable Daily Exposure (mg)", "name": "Name"}
    
            excel_data = pd.read_excel(const.get_master_data(), sheet_name="nitrosamine", usecols='A:D', nrows=13)
            allure.attach(excel_data.to_html(), name="excel_data", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.HTML)
    
            api_df = master_data_snapshot[columns_mapping.keys()]
            excel_df = excel_data[columns_mapping.values()]
    
            api_df_sorted = api_df.sort_values(by=list(columns_mapping.keys())).reset_index(drop=True)
            excel_df_sorted = excel_df.sort_values(by=list(columns_mapping.values())).reset_index(drop=True)
    
            columns_to_convert = ['acceptableIntake', 'ade']
            api_df_sorted[columns_to_convert] = api_df_sorted[columns_to_convert].apply(pd.to_numeric, errors='coerce')
    
            api_df_sorted = api_df_sorted.rename(columns=columns_mapping)
    
            max_rows = max(len(api_df_sorted), len(excel_df_sorted))
    
            numeric_columns = api_df_sorted.select_dtypes(include=np.number).columns
            string_columns = api_df_sorted.select_dtypes(include=object).columns
    
            for row in range(max_rows):
                if row >= len(excel_df_sorted):
                    mismatched_rows.append(row)
                    continue
                comparison_successful = True
                for column in string_columns:
                    api_value = api_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
                    excel_value = excel_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
    
                    comparison_successful &= compare_portal(api_value, excel_value, column, row)
                    if not comparison_successful:
                        mismatched_rows.append(row)
                        break
    
                for column in numeric_columns:
                    api_value = api_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
                    excel_value = excel_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
                    comparison_successful &= compare_portal(api_value, excel_value, column, row)
                    if not comparison_successful:
                        if math.isnan(api_value) and math.isnan(excel_value):
                            continue
                        mismatched_rows.append(row)
                        break
    
            merged_df = pd.concat([api_df_sorted, excel_df_sorted], axis=1, keys=['API Data', 'Excel Data'])
            allure.attach(merged_df.to_html(), name="merged_data", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.HTML)
            allure.attach(str(mismatched_rows), name="mismatched_rows", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.HTML)
    
            if len(mismatched_rows) != 0:
>               assert assert_flag, f"There are {len(mismatched_rows)} mismatched rows."
E               AssertionError: There are 1 mismatched rows.
E               assert False
